## glob

```{python}
import glob
import os
folder = os.getcwd()
paths = glob.glob(os.path.join(folder, "*.Rmd"), recursive=True)
type(paths)
for i, path in enumerate(paths):
    if i >= 5:
        break
    print(path)
```

*********************************************************************

## iglob

Like `glob` but returns an iterable.

```{python}
import glob
import os
folder = os.getcwd()
paths = glob.iglob(os.path.join(folder, "*.Rmd"), recursive=True)
type(paths)
for i, path in enumerate(paths):
    if i >= 5:
        break
    print(path)
```
